title: Happy Gilmore
short_plot_summary: Happy Gilmore, an unsuccessful hockey player, discovers an uncanny talent for golf and uses his new skills to save his grandmother's house.
explanation: A hockey stick, representing Happy's aspiration to play hockey and his unique golf swing
An older man, symbolizing Chubbs Peterson, Happy's mentor and friend
A golfer, representing Happy's successful transition to professional golf
A screw or nail, representing Mr. Larson, who had a nail stuck in his head and supports Happy throughout the movie
A stack of money, symbolizing the prize money Happy needs to save his grandmother's house
